title: Segfault & invalid free with a GRUCell
body_html:
Hello,

I noticed a crash when using cuda (python segfault with an invalid free) when using GRUCell with the following invalid arguments:

  • Making a GruCell.
  • Feed the cell with a batch of size B > 1 for the input layer and a hidden layer of batch size 1. self.gru_cell(input_layer, hidden_layer)

There is a mismatch in the batch dimension of the two inputs of the model. The expected behavior should be an error message telling a mismatch in dimension. The observed behavior is a code running while using CPU implementation, and a crash with the cuda implementation.

Observed with Pytorch version 0.3.1. The bug should be easily reproducible.

Best regards,
